trans-unit.source: Create a Restore Token to Perform a Web Restore

seg-source.mrk: Create a Restore Token to Perform a Web Restore

target.mrk: Créer un jeton de restauration pour effectuer une restauration Web

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in administrator or multi-agent mode. This can be useful to restore files from any agent or agent groups within a tenant. To perform this type of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you need a restore token.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to perform a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in administrator or multi-agent mode.
This can be useful to restore files from any agent or agent groups within a tenant.
To perform this type of <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you need a restore token.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet d'effectuer une <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> administrateur ou multi-agents
Cela peut être utile pour restaurer des fichiers à partir de n'importe quel agent ou groupes d'agent dans une entité.
Pour effectuer ce type de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vous avez besoin d'un jeton de restauration.

trans-unit.source: To access a tenant, you need a dedicated restore token. Make sure the tenant is logged into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when connecting to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> application. For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: To access a tenant, you need a dedicated restore token.

Make sure the tenant is logged into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when connecting to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> application.
For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour accéder à une entité, vous avez besoin d'un jeton de restauration dédié.

Assurez-vous que l'entité est connectée à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lors de la connexion à l'application de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour plus de détails, voir <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.
